analysis.key_quote: I strongly urge the federal government and its leaders to reconsider and to continue to support those who have made it their life’s work to advance the well being of US citizens.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to Schedule F by highlighting concerns about replacing seasoned experts with political appointees, which undermines the effectiveness and integrity of government. This aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization, indicating a clear stance against the proposed rule.
